Articles.Content:
Hello! I downloaded KSP not from Steam, I loaded it one day, and it just loaded into a Black Screen. It still has the cursor, but other than that, its just black. I normally launch it in Windowed mode, on lowest graphics (cuz I have a low end PC, meaning no NVIDIA or AMD GPUs. Just Intel Integrated Graphics). What do I do?
 

PS: I play on version 1.12.2.3167, and I have Windows 10.

Edited February 11 by AzKSP
